welcome_message_body: Welcome to Normal, where the charm of a quaint college town meets the vibrant culture of the Midwest. Known for its beautiful parks, diverse dining options, and friendly atmosphere, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

airports.airport_name: Central Illinois Regional Airport at Bloomington-Normal

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Central Illinois Regional Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for private and charter flights at Central Illinois Regional Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
